name: Hexile
description:
Hexile is a 3D first-person puzzle platformer game in which players confront the consequences of manipulating their environments. You find yourself in a beautiful, surreal, mysterious landscape, with no idea how you got there or how to escape. Your only clues are in the artifacts left behind by previous explorers, and the hidden powers of the world. Use your new abilities to manipulate the unique landscape and solve environmental puzzles, but be wary - this fast-paced and immersive landscape holds dangerous secrets.

Key Features:

  • Tight, fluid 3D platforming.

    A philosophical narrative with themes of loneliness and self-reflection.

    A unique landscape in which every component can be manipulated.

    Compelling environmental puzzles
